gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Annex III. INSPIRE Dataset for Natural risk zones Theme

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: INSPIRE dataset for Natural Risk Zones theme represents information about flood hazards and risk zones in Lithuania. The NZ.Flood layer is shown at a scale of 1: 25 000.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Lithuanian geological survey under the Ministry of Environment
National Land Service under the Ministry of Agriculture
State Service for Protected Areas under the Ministry of Environment
Department of Cultural Heritage under the Ministry of Culture

gmd:title.gmx:Anchor: Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:explanation.gco:CharacterString: This data set is conformant with the INSPIRE Implementing Rules for the interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: INSPIRE dataset for Natural Risk Zones theme is created using input data sets: 1) social, cultural and natural objects located in flood hazard zones, 2) coastal flooding risk areas, and 3) flooding risk areas caused by sknowmelt runoff and rainfall, data provider â Environmental Protection Agency; 4) data of karst areas (data source â Map of Lithuania's karst zone boundaries 1:50,000), and 5) data of risk places (data source â Map of risk places in Vilnius and Kaunas), data provider â Lithuanian Geological Survey under the Ministry of Environment of Lithuania; 6) Cultural Heritage Registry, data provider â Department of Cultural Heritage under the Ministry of Culture; 7) State Cadastre of Protected Areas of the Republic of Lithuania, data provider â State Service for Protected Areas under the Ministry of Environment; 8) buildings and landfills (data source â Georeference spatial data set for the territory of the Republic of Lithuania 1:50,000 (GDR50LT)), data provider â National Land Service under the Ministry of Agriculture; 9) Spatial data set of (geo) reference base cadastre (GRPK), data provider â the Ministry of Agriculture of the Republic of Lithuania. The output data set is created by State Enterprise GIS-Centras, Lithuania.
